Package net.entersol.gdbc

Class Summary
Gdbc This class is directly responsible of sending queries to the server via an IOGate and Receiving results from server as json object request object has this format
ResultSet The respond from the PHP server for SQL queries are passed to this class it contains results for all kind of Queries but it behaves differently for queries that suppose to retrieve data and others that manipulate it.
SqlStatment This class creates sql statements that is ready to be sent by Gdbc the queries are two types: direct and indirect direct query is simple, it just send plain sql from client to server, indirect queries are queries saved in the server as array the client just send index and complementary arguments
 

Exception Summary
SqlException This class extends IOGateException to be convenient with SQL statements
